website_summaries.verdict: We love how users feel the results almost instantly when using this highly effective, light detoxifying face mask.
pros: Immediately delivers a fresh-face feeling, tightening pores
Provides a refreshing tingling feeling without over-drying
Boasts a light and pleasant scent
Feels light on face, making it easy to wear for extended time if desired
Smooths face and helps to clear up blackheads
cons: A few customers with very sensitive skin have experienced either dryness or breakouts

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this mask being used by multiple users on Instagram and decided to give it a try. It is amazing! It pulled everything out of my pores including black heads, dirt, and oil. I have sensitive skin and this mask is gentle on it causing no redness or irritation. Once I wash it off it have skin, glowing skin! I would recommend this to anyone, especially those with acne and sensitive skin. Also Teami Blends customer service is quick to answer and thoughtful.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My teenaged daughter has acne and am hoping it helps,she loves it so far. I used it myself last night and loved it. I left it on for a long time because I could feel it tightening a little and but it felt really light on my face that I almost forgot it was there unless I talked. Looking forward to using it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great service, great product, smooth face !
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the great customer service! That truly goes a long way! I love the detox mask and green tea scrub so far so I foresee future purchases in my future. I will be starting the colon cleanse tonight soooo I’m hoping that goes well!
customer_reviews.author: A.leigh

customer_reviews.title: It smells wonderful and it makes your skin feel wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It smells wonderful and it makes your skin feel wonderful! I also love the fact this was made in the United States!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Got this 3 days ago & have used it every day. (1-4x a wk is recommended use) and I'm loving it! I love that you can literally feel it working. Ive tried other masks but have never had such a wonderful tingling sensation throughout duration of mask. Pores are getting noticiably smaller & acne has improved quite a bit!! In 3 days. I'm very tempted 2 use this every day but I will follow directions & only use 4xs a wk. Maybe overuse creates unpleasant outcome-dryness or something similar. Love it. Already planning on getting more as soon as i run out! Thanks Teami!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way the Detox Mask made my face feel. After first use I noticed that my face was pink, from increased blood flow. My skin was so soft to the touch, firmer and brighter. The mask is great for getting rid of dead skin and the gunk in your pores. My Mom tried the mask and she loves it too. She asked me to order some for her, so she can have her own jar. She says her face still feels clean 2 days after using the mask. My Mom and I will be lifelong customers. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous mask!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is such a delight to use. Smells marvelous and leaves my face so soft. I love using it weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Definitely reccomend.  Very refreshing face mask.
customer_reviews.text: I love how refreshing this face mask makes my face feel. Not oily after or hard to take off. Just feels like a burst of hydration to my face. I scored it on a daily deal for $20. Super happy with it. I even convinced my husband to try it and he loved it. Said its crazy how relaxing it was to have on!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mask based on a YouTube review and I love it. I have dry sensitive skin and eczema and this products works like magic. It tingles a little bit in the beginning but as it starts to set you don't feel a thing. I use it about twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Sequoria Wilson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: This face mask is so nice! It smells amazing and you can see it working in all of your oily pores. Definitely going to keep using once or twice a week this summer!
customer_reviews.author: C.F.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask - it tingles a bit when you put in on but I feel like my skin feels so much better after using it. I typically use it 2 times a week and i've noticed a reduction in blackheads and oil.
customer_reviews.author: AMS80

customer_reviews.title: I Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Its only been 4 days and my blemishes have gotten lighting and starting to fade. Im so excited to see how my skin improves over time. Update: i have been using this for a year now and I wish I would of taken pictures pf before and after because my face is so much more healthier now. Also a tip is to stay hydrated and also washing your face before use. I use either black soap or cocoa butter soap. But this is definitely worth the price because it last awhile before you need your next batch!
customer_reviews.author: Tamondja S.

customer_reviews.title: Thick, creamy, lemony concoction
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on smoothly and evenly and my skin felt really fresh and clean after using it. It has a pretty strong lemon scent, which makes sense since lemongrass is a main ingredient. When it dried it felt pretty tight, and I was a bit anxious to wash it off so I could have full use of my face again. I don't regularly use masks, so perhaps this is typical, but that sums up my experience with this product, which I may or may not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: detox my face
customer_reviews.text: needed this mask as my face started breaking out due to new medication - am able to use 4 or 5 days a weeks and seems to work better than just cleansing my face and using a lotion for acne - am doing all 3 and face feels good
customer_reviews.author: K. Schlosser

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive skin and when I saw an AD for this mask I thought let me try it! I put it one let it sit for 15 minutes and took it off. My skin was so smooth and soft. the next morning the few blemishes I did have dried up and my skin looked great! It didn't burn me or irritate my skin in the few months I've used this product.
customer_reviews.author: adoyle93

customer_reviews.title: Came with lots of promises it didnt deliver
customer_reviews.text: The seller keeps flooding my inbox with emails and requests to review the product, so here's my review. The clay mask didnt do anything for my skin. It smells great and goes on easily, but when it comes down to really clearing my skin (especially when it comes to the acbe), it didn't do anything. It's really strong though when it dries and tightens, which left my skin really dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jane7

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of the product. Makes my skin feel soft and healthy. I have been suing regularly
customer_reviews.author: meredith

customer_reviews.title: It’s a god send
customer_reviews.text: So I just tried the matcha mask today for the first time. Thank you for creating such incredible products. I love your brand. It’s everything and it’s so nice to have a company I legitimately trust and don’t have to feel nervous about trying any of their products. You can really feel the mask working and pulling crap out of your skin. Just shut up and take my money. Teami is everything! 🙌🏼🙌🏼🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cantle

customer_reviews.title: My skin felt great
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it, it did kind of sting (hence the sensitive skin rating). The second time, it had lessened and the third time, no stinging sensation. My skin was so much softer afterwards. I liked this so much (the scent is amazing, BTW), I bought some for my son who has issues with keeping his face hydrated enough and he likes it too and uses it 2-3 times a week. It's a mask so I spread it on a little thick (not too much) so that is why the sheerness rating is a 4 and not a 5.
customer_reviews.author: ACP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mask!
customer_reviews.text: I was in the midst of a serious breakout problem when I ordered this mask. I used it everyday for about a week and it totally got everything under control. Now I use it 2 maybe 3 times a week and it’s kept new breakouts away and my skin just feels and looks healthier. A little does go a long way so this jar will probably last me at least 6 or 7 months. It does tingle at first when you put it on, but at least for me it wasn’t a sign of a reaction or anything bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burned my skin...
customer_reviews.text: I love the tea oil but the face mask burned me as soon as I applied it to my skin. My husbands didn’t burn so maybe this isn’t good for sensitive skin like mine :(
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good mask!
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this mask. It smells nice and goes on as expected. What was unexpected was that a day after using it, I had little bits of yuck come out of my pores. It was like my skin tightened and squeezed out what was in it. This has happened twice after using the mask, I haven't changed anything else in my routine, so I assumeits the mask! It's kinda gross to share, but there it is!
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: Made my face break out...
customer_reviews.text: After about a week, maybe two, my face began breaking out with little white/yellow bumps...sent it all back. Yup, bought the entire line...and some tea...sent it ALL back!
customer_reviews.author: Dink Dinklage

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered w sensitive, oily, dry and acne skin. I break out regardless of what I have tried. I gave up but at 35 it was worst. Acne like I was a teenager, which is so embarrassing! Proactive no longer worked. I read the reviews and decided to give it a try. As soon as you put this on its AHHHMAZZINGGGGGG!! You can feel it instantly it feels refreshing like its cleaning your skin. It drys up on your face like any normal mask but it's not uncomfortable. I use it every other day. I loveeeee this and have told friends and family to get it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: The questions asked to determine the amount of stars were pointless and irrelevant to the product, however the actual product is GOOD... I'd say amazing, but I actually wouldn't recommend for anyone with sensitive skin as it does burn. I, however have very oily, acne prone skin so I needed this and it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jnell

customer_reviews.title: My skin was softer
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of face masks--this one works great! I noticed my skin feeling softer instantly after taking it off. You can definitely tell it is working when you apply it. What I mean by that is you can feel it working. It does have a light fragrance smell and smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle Gill

customer_reviews.title: Not for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin and have experienced chemical burns from various top brand cleansers and masks. Unfortunately, this product had the same effect. I applied the mask after rinsing my face with a gentle cleanser and it immediately started to burn. I thought my cleanser was the issue so a few days later I just rinsed my face with water and then applied the mask, but once again I experienced immediate burning after only applying it to one section of my face. Luckily, I did not have a chemical burn after immediately rinsing but my face was extremely red and sensitive to touch.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Get it and you will love it.
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me buy a YouTuber. I decided to give it a try and I absolutely loved it. I am a transgender MTF and this has definitely took the quality of my skin to a whole new hire level. Every single time I use it I noticed an immediate affect and my skin is so soft and moist. I would totally recommend this product to anybody who's looking for a good face mask to do a at home Day Spa. I will never use a different one this is absolutely perfect for me and everyone I give it to for them to try they absolutely love it also.
customer_reviews.author: Mela Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works
customer_reviews.text: Before this mask i have used different(expensive, popular) masks. After checking the reviews decided to give it a try and absolutely in love. I noticed freshness and difference right after first use. I have oily, sensitive skin btw. Little bit hard to wash off.
customer_reviews.author: Nursulu

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Mask Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've used A LOT of face masks in my day - they're my favorite way to treat my self. This has turned out to be my favorite "all in one" mask and my skin feels SO clean and refreshed after using it. A little bit of this product goes a long way so you can really make it last too! My skin isn't the most sensitive ever, however, it does tend to breakout when I use certain masks and it does NOT with this one. I've been using it 1-2 times a week and my pores have shrunk so much. Highly recommend adding this to your weekly skin routine! :)
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Moody

customer_reviews.title: Teami- a great feel, natural ingredients and real customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This product was great! It had a spa scent and was of high quality. After the set, it washed off easily leaving no redness (I'm fair-skinned). It also deep cleaned my pores better than any other mud-mask I've tried. Typically I'm pretty tight with my money, so I'll only do monthly treatments, but now I've been using it weekly. Ha! To top it off, the business reached out to me directly asking about my experience with the product. I've been very impressed, to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: May work different for others
customer_reviews.text: So I have extremely sensitive skin so I thought I try this all natural product. It smells great creates a really tight mask that you can feel working. But I haven't noticed a difference in my skin at all I've used it for about a month now. I do admit it gives you a glow afterwards. But is followed by extreme dryness. I mean it pulls all the moisture out of your face. To each it's own it may work better. But I have no skin issues at all. I just was looking for a daily cleanser. I'll just stick to my old routine.
customer_reviews.author: Sherece

customer_reviews.title: Feels natural and smells great
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing, goes on smooth, without that chemical feel or smell. It felt great on, and washed off easily. My skin immediately loved it. Would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give myself time to use and I have to say it's not bad. The scent smells nice and I like how my skin feels after I wash it off. I leave it on for ten minutes and you start to feel your face tighten. I do have some blackheads on my nose and have noticed that when I use it, there has been less of it. I will buy again and will also try there face scrub in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: One of the best green tea masks around
customer_reviews.text: Love this teami face mask and the way it leaves my skin feeling! I have been drinking the teas for some time but this is the first time that I have tried the other products and so glad I got to try this face mask. I already love green tea and all of the benefits that it provides so this mask feels so refreshing. Looking forward to seeing what it does with continued use.
customer_reviews.author: Kruti

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny :)
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive combination/oily acne prone skin. This mask so gentle on my skin but tough on oil and dirt without drying me out. It feels cool on my face and it does tighten so you won't be able to make expressions for a few minutes :P The smell is so pleasant, the lemongrass soothes me and feels natural. If you don't want to break the bank, this mask is a great addition to a balanced skin care routine for temperamental skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: And it scares my finance which makes it even better!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff makes my face feel magical. And it scares my finance which makes it even better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Hands-down best mask I have ever used. My skin GLOWS after using this mask. I can't say nice enough things.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use it twice a week. Made my face a ...
customer_reviews.text: Use it twice a week. Made my face a lot smoother right away! Has really prevented random breakouts from popping up.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: High expectations from reviews, but...
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I didn’t buy this from the website because they basically don’t have a return policy. They claim that this is good for all skin types, but it really dried me out as a normal-dry skin type. It felt very tingly and invigorating on the face, but just made my skin feel tight afterwards; I cannot imagine using this more than once a week which is what they recommended. One thing also worried me: on the box, it says “warning: the safety of this product has not been determined.” I don’t think this product would be good for dry and sensitive skinned people
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use it a couple times a week and I love how my skin feels afterward. It has clay in it so it doesn't hurt my skin too much. I have dry sensitive skin but incorporating this into my routine was easy and pain free. I notice that my poors look a bit cleaner after I use it. It lasts a long time since you dont use it often and you dont need a very thick layer of it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Favorite detox mask I’ve tried thus far. It smells so good and feels amazing going on and washing off. Leaves your skin feeling so fresh and soft! Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mask I've ever owned. My acne has subsided without my face being bone dry. Will buy again.. And again.. And again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant but first time using was a bit scary
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much. I have very damaged red skin on my cheeks and I’ve seen such a difference using this product twice. Also has helped my very oily t-zone. First time I used it it was very tingly and made my face very red, but after that my skin got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Clark

customer_reviews.title: A legit detox mask!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this facemask today and my skin feels heavenly after 💚💚💚 it smells wonderful but natural, not synthetic fragrance. I can't wait to keep using it and seeing benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Jaquillard

customer_reviews.title: CANT STOP TOUCHING MY FACE!
customer_reviews.text: My face is so soft after using this mask! It's by far the best mask I've EVER used. However, it does burn/tingle the first 30 seconds or so but isn't so intense I can't handle it. I also purchased the scrub to exfoliate and recommend this too. I can't stop touching my face!!! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes YES.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the buy! This is my second time purchasing. I use 1-2 times a week sometimes I skip a week. So this product lasts me up to about 6 months give or take. But it works magic. I have eczema on my face. I use this around my eczema. But I consider my face to be sensitive skin and this works AMAZINGLY. Clears up acne quickly and burns like a 2 on a scale of 1-5 (5 burning a lot) so I feel clean, natural and pure after each use. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Not recommending !
customer_reviews.text: This product claims to be for sensitive skin! I honestly don't recommend this to anyone it is really harsh on my face and let my face very dry! I will stick with Josie Marian face mask witch is Amazzzing and gentale .Returning!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Stock up!
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this product! From a teenager thru the years I’ve taken great care of my skin so I never had large pores. What it did was bring to a glow and firmness to my face that I haven’t seen in years!
customer_reviews.author: Gmas-got-it

customer_reviews.title: Home Usage
customer_reviews.text: I loved the smell and that it was organic. I bought the product to use for facials for clients. When it came time to take the product off, it was difficult. The client was becoming agitated the longer it took for me to take the product off. It’s like it became brick on the face. I feel like this product is more of a personal home usage where I have to lean forward over the sink and splash warm water on my face to wash the product away.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great mask! The smell isn't off putting, it does it's job, and my skin is smooth and feels refreshed after using it. Takes a little work to rinse, but that's quite okay. Worth it for the ingredients alone.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! After just one use my skin was brighter, my current blemishes smaller and my skin was left feeling clean but hydrated. I have rosacea and sensitive skin, this mask was gentle yet effective. It may burn a little bit when applying but it stops and just meant to me it’s working! Also satisfying to see all the gunk come out of my pores.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: will take some time to see if I have good results.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying... will take some time to see if I have good results.. I mentioned to my friend that her face really was looking good, and she shared that this is the product she had been using for the last month..
customer_reviews.author: Diann Blissit

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great face mask! It's easy to apply, comes off easily, and leaves my face feeling soft and fresh!
customer_reviews.author: SusyG

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love !!! Been using it for 2 weeks now and my skin feels great after every use!!
customer_reviews.author: Jinie Dorcelan

customer_reviews.title: The best mask I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews. Ever. But I have to for this gem. My skin has taken a huge hit over the last few years after child birth and poor diet. Blotchy, acne-ridden, scarred... nothing has helped. Other masks either burn my skin off or make it worse. After just one use of this mask, I have seen significant improvement in my skin (and my boyfriend even noticed too). I have to restrain myself from using it every day - I'm THAT obsessed. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for your skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product. It is so worth the price. I have sensitive skin and had no trouble at all with this product . Your skin feels awesome after you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bcree

customer_reviews.title: Best Mud Mask I've Tried!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time repurchasing this mask! My skin looks and feels so clean after I use it! Smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It burns a lil and only leaves skin smooth with warm water! I have only used it 2 times but my skin feels great! Make sure to moisturize skin after
customer_reviews.author: Lucy M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product to those who have acne and acne scars and dry/oily skin . This detox mask works wonders on my face this is the 1st product I ever used that actually made my face feel really clean and fresh. The scent is not too strong . I've been using this mask for almost a week now and it makes my skin feels great I can't wait to use it some more and see how else it benefits my skin!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Very awesome !! Helps with breakouts and even skin out! I use it at night time after I shower !! Wake up with a soft face and looks clean !! Helps me from breaking out !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Works for Psoriasis
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for myself, but one day I tried it on my boyfriend because he has psoriasis and it helps clear it up. Will be buying again
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Mask
customer_reviews.text: This mask smells wonderful and is extremely gentle. I have eczema and psoriasis on my face and it never breaks it out with this. The bottle feels expensive and it’s a great product. I only wish (which is no big deal I’m just spoiled) there was a spatula, or some type of applicator, so I could put it on my face. It’s 5 stars for me! I’ve never been a mask person, but I do enjoy this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders! Definitely can feel it tightening my pores. Helps with pimples as well
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Quantity was not full
customer_reviews.text: First the good things, product arrived on time and it smells great but it was a disappointment as soon as I opened the cap of the box, it was half empty. I have ordered this product before and it was good and completely filled, but when I ordered for a friend it came half quantity than original.It is kind of sad on my part that I recommended it to my friend and this is what he received. I feel ordering again was a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my purchase - so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love my purchase - so easy to use, and my skin feels and looks so soft and nourished. I read Bethenny Frankel’s endorsement and wanted to give it a try-so glad I did! Will definitely continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JOANN

customer_reviews.title: I usually wash my face first, so it burns ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually wash my face first, so it burns a little at first. But I’ve noticed an improvement in my skin. I use it about 3 time a week, and my pores and smaller and my skin is smoother
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: My Face Feels Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent and the way it feels on my skin! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: You'll feel tingling, but trust me keep it on, see the results after, and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: So i used this product for cleansing my pours. And geting rid of acne. As soon as i applied the Teami Mask. My acne cleared up so easily. Bumps that were on my chin. Were no longer on my chin. With the FIRST USE. I wouldn't say i dislike anything about the product. It actually does what it says it's going to do. So I'm a happy partner. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Treat yo self!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is the perfect balance. Some masks dry me out too much, but this one is moisturizing without leaving me oily. Smells and feels amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Approved
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, hyram from youtube recommended this mask over Aztec clay And I can see why, my face wasn't dry after use. Which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Struggling with acne and breakouts due to breastfeeding, this mask does wonders on my skin! My skin is sensitive, dry, and breakout prone and once I wash this off, my face isn't red and the blemishes tend to go away quickly. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Jones

customer_reviews.title: No more acne!
customer_reviews.text: Ultimate favorite face mask I've ever used! My skin feels soft and best of all NO MORE ACNE
customer_reviews.author: Aurea Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I don’t notice too much of a visual difference (I have sunspots, redness, acne prone) however, it’s great for my ridiculously sensitive skin, and my face and neck feel amazing after using this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely mask
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it is easy to apply with a brush. The texture it is very smooth and soft. After applying the skin feels a little chill and you can feel how it is working on the pores. It dries perfectly and it washes easy enough. The product it is a little expensive but it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: Great mask.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of masks smell weird. Once you open this one, very nice smell. I also liked the texture of it on the skin. Leaves the skin clean, healthy with a great glow. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Ohana

customer_reviews.title: Great peoducts
customer_reviews.text: As always Teami did it! Its a great product! Love all Teami products.. tea, creams.. I ordered the serum for me as well
customer_reviews.author: YG

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your face fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter who has sensitive skin and tends to have breakouts. She absolutely loves it. Leaves her face feeling fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton I.

customer_reviews.title: LOOOOVE THIS MASK!
customer_reviews.text: I have literally never written a product review before in my life, but for this mask - it was 100% worth sharing how much I love it. The mask feels SO amazing and refreshing when it’s on my face and leaves my skin feeling so clean, fresh and SOFT after. I am seriously so impressed by this product. Will definitely be buying again and again and again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally hooked! This is BY FAR the best facemask ever. It smells so amazing and my skin feels so soft and silky after I use it. I have sensitive skin and it actually helps it. Huge fan of this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Teami Rules
customer_reviews.text: Love how smooth and fresh it leaves my face applies on like butter I highly recommend using product to clear up skin and leaving it smooth Discount on teami website - Savage91
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: The scent with this product smells beautiful. When I first apply near upper cheeks it has a burning sensation for a brief moment, not sure if that is due to the lemon in it but my skin didnt break out or have any rashes. It really does tighten the skin and leaves the skin feeling smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Ricka

customer_reviews.title: It really improves your skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this face mask. My face feels tighter and looks brighter right after I use it. It also helps minimize my pores, and clears my face.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Results
customer_reviews.text: This product works good if I have a small breakout and it leaves my skin soft and firm.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne C

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and acne and this has helped quite a bit, I use it once a week (2 times during my period when my skin is super hormonal) and love it. The texture is great and it really has reduced my acne.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Knaak

customer_reviews.title: It lights the face so bad
customer_reviews.text: I personally like this product because it has a very mild scent of green tea. I feels good after a couple uses, But it lights my face so bad that I couldn't wait to wash it off. My son feels the same way when I did it for him. the reason I gave it 4 stars. But overall, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Trang Bui

customer_reviews.title: My skin looks and feels amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love how this mask makes my skin feel afterwards. It’s brighter and softer and I can’t stop touching my face. My skin looks and feels amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Din

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Mask
customer_reviews.text: In LOVE with this stuff. It has helped clear up a lot of my daughters acne. Have already purchased another one.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far with this product. When you put it on you can feel it work. After you wash it off it’s such a refreshing feeling. It’s already working on my skin. Highly recommended!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great face mask

customer_reviews.text: Love it, will buy it again I love The teami detox mask. I use it daily and love the way my skin looks and feels after.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: Have used this mask a few times now and love it! Gentle and really pulls up the gunk in the face well!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: MUST PURCHASE !!! I have sensitive skin dry skin and after using this mask , my skin felt hydrated and was glowing.
customer_reviews.author: Irma Silva

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this mask. My skin is very sensitive and prone to breakouts, normally masks just over dry it or work sometimes and then stop and then I just breakout. This one smells nice, pulls impurities from my skin without it being uncomfortable and overdrying. I highly recommend this mask!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s was good
customer_reviews.text: It’s an amazing product I do have sensitive skin so I felt a little tingly and it burned a little but it’s still an amazing product. I suggest you try it in a small portion of skin before

customer_reviews.title: Slight tingling once you put the mask.. it ...
customer_reviews.text: Slight tingling once you put the mask ..it can be little drying so I only use it once a week ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for sensitive skin. I use it maybe 2-3 times a week and my skin is noticeably soft. My eyebrow tech even commented how soft and pretty my skin is !

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! It smells so fresh and amazing and afterwards my face felt soft and full of moisture!!

product_meta.title: Teami Green Tea Matcha Detox Face Mask - Deep Pore Cleansing & Hydrating Blackhead Remover Mud Mask with Bentonite Clay, Facial Masks Best for Acne, Blackheads, Wrinkles, Pore Minimizer, Anti Aging
feature_bullets: ANTI-BREAKOUT - We all want that beautiful glowing skin right? So we get a mask that promises just that, but end up with acne instead and lose all hope for ever having the skin we want! Unlike some mask products on the market claiming to be for sensitive skin, our green tea mask contains lemongrass which helps balance out the drying effects of typical clay masks, so your skin will feel HYDRATED and SOFT, clean, and renewed.

GENTLE, NOT HARSH - Truly for all skin types, our green tea detox mask won't cause acne or skin to break out. Great for reducing the appearance of blackheads and cleaning pores naturally. Detoxify and cleanse your skin with a refreshing mud mask. Have a YOU beauty night with a friend; and have fun with it!

NO HARMFUL CHEMICALS - You wouldn't knowingly eat harmful chemicals right? Well you shouldn't put them on your skin either! That's why our organic, effective green tea detox mask contains only the best ingredients.. Bentonite and Kaolin Clay to draw out the toxins, Green Tea packed with high antioxidant levels for anti aging benefits, and Lemongrass to help your skin retain natural oils and hydration.

CRUELTY FREE & VEGAN - That's right. LEAPING BUNNY CERTIFIED too! No animals were harmed in the making of this awesome green tea goodness. We take great care to make our 75% Organic facial masks for women right here in Florida, and only make small batches to retain high quality.

SOLD BY TEAMI: Be sure to look for the words "Sold by Teami Blends and Fulfilled by Amazon." next to the IN STOCK sign in order to get the full level of service you deserve! We want to make sure you get the product & results you're looking for, which is why you'll want to purchase directly from us on Amazon. Love it or your money back!
